title: Worlds AEST Time
body:
Anyone know what timezones are quoted here? http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/worlds/world_championship_2017/schedule/play_in_groups/Day%201

Want to know the game times for AEST UTC 10:00+

replies.body:
Im pretty sure the site dynamically quotes in our local time, so whatever it says there. 
But someone correct me if I'm wrong.
